original_text: Jesus answered him, “You would have no authority over me at all unless it had been given you from above. Therefore he who delivered me over to you has the greater sin.”
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하시되 위에서 주지 아니하셨더라면 나를 해할 권한이 없었으리니 그러므로 나를 네게 넘겨 준 자의 죄는 더 크다 하시니라

sentences.original_text: You would have no authority over me at all
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나에 대해 전혀 권세가 없을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: unless it had been given you from above.
he who delivered me over to you
